BroadcastTopic.name: BroadcastTopic
BroadcastTopic.description: Represents a definition of a broadcast topic. A broadcast topic is associated with a list of Experience Cloud network sites for Service Cloud and collaboration rooms for Sales Cloud.

BroadcastReason.description: Reason for the broadcast topic. This field differentiates between Service Cloud and Sales Cloud use cases.

IsFeatured.description: Indicates whether the broadcast topic is featured (true) or not (false). This field is applicable only when BroadcastReason is FeedChannels. A featured topic displays the associated collaboration rooms to new users.

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

BroadcastTopic.accessRules: To access this object with Sales Cloud, enable Slack Terms of Service and Sales Cloud for Slack App.
